metadata.title: CVE-2021-44857 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in MediaWiki before 1.35.5, 1.36.x before 1.36.3, and 1.37.x before 1.37.1. It is possible to use action=mcrundo followed by action=mcrrestore to replace the content of any arbitrary page (that the user doesn't have edit rights for). This applies to any public wiki, or a private wiki that has at least one page set in $wgWhitelistRead.

criterions.comment: mediawiki package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
